creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons, in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Two-panel huipil with supplementary weft patterning and embroidered randa. Natural ground with designs predominantly in purple, with small amounts of red, pink, blue, green, brown, orange. Patterns are highly stylized birds and zoomorphic figures on upper half of garment.
title: Woman's blouse (Huipil)
